context: Hey there, can I recommend a movie for you? I love fantasy movies, like The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring (2001)
Well, I actually am not a fan of that whole trilogy but I know it was a good film.
What sort of movies do you like?
I love a good comedy or animated movie like The Secret Life of Pets (2016)
Awww. I love animated movies, too.
I'm excited for Incredibles 2 (2018) Can't wait it comes out June 15th I believe. I also just fell in love with Coco (2017) Such a sweet movie. ♥
entity: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring (2001)
resp: I saw The Secret Life of Pets (2016) and really liked it. I'm not sure that I've seen The Incredibles (2004)
